document.full_text: right-wing lawmaker keiko fujimori pulled into a statistical tie with left-wing nationalist ollanta humala, a poll showed on friday, as they wooed undecided centrist voters whose support will define the presidential election.
document.title: peru election race tightens to tie
lines_and_colors: right-wing lawmaker keiko fujimori pulled into a statistical tie with left-wing nationalist ollanta humala, a poll showed on friday, as they wooed undecided centrist voters whose support will define the presidential election.
